entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS EVENING
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
MORE HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS AROUND 40

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
